title: Dance Class Jb600 Caramel Leather Jazz Shoe W/Gore (Little Kid/Big Kid)
features: Twin side gore boot in ultra soft glove leather
Mesh arch insert for breathable comfort.

description: Did someone say jazz hands? It's all about the feet with these ultra-comfortable boots from Dance Class. The ridiculously soft glove-leather upper is enhanced by a mesh arch insert for breathable comfort. The split sole design provides perfect flexibility while the EVA sole and heel patch offer the lightness you need as a dance quick on your feet!

Building footwear for comfort and performance is the Dance Class way. Classic styling in high-quality leathers and materials combined with competitive pricing has made Dance Class a leader in the industry. Their footwear is fit tested for comfort and wear and is sized as regular street shoes. Choose Dance Class for all your dance footwear needsâ€”jazz, clogging, ballet, lyrical and tap. They make dancing affordable without sacrificing quality.
